#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
#define llu long long int
#define M 10000007
llu d[10010][7];
bool idp[10010][7];
int dp(int runs,int balls)
{
    if(runs<=0) return 1;
    if(balls ==0)return 1;
    if(idp[runs][balls])return d[runs][balls];
    idp[runs][balls]=1;
    llu an=0;
    an=(an+dp(runs,balls-1))%M;//Wicket
    an=(an+dp(runs,balls-1))%M;//Dot
    an=(an+dp(runs-1,balls-1))%M;//1 Run
     an=(an+dp(runs-2,balls-1))%M;//2 Runs
      an=(an+dp(runs-3,balls-1))%M;//3 runs
       an=(an+dp(runs-4,balls-1))%M;//4 Runs
         an=(an+dp(runs-6,balls-1))%M;//6 Runs
         an=(an+dp(runs-1,balls))%M;//Wide
         an=(an+dp(runs-1,balls))%M;//No ball
     an=(an+dp(runs-2,balls))%M;//1 Wd
     an=(an+dp(runs-2,balls))%M;//1 Nb
      an=(an+dp(runs-3,balls))%M;//2 Wd
        an=(an+dp(runs-5,balls))%M;//4 Wd
         an=(an+dp(runs-5,balls))%M;//4 Wd
         an=(an+dp(runs-7,balls))%M;//6 Nb
    d[runs][balls]=(an+1)%M;//If the match finishes in this ball(last wicket loss).This is the tricky one
    return d[runs][balls];
}
int main()
{
    int n,c=0,t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
              cin>>n;
                 c++;
                 cout<<"Case "<<c<<":"<<" "<<dp(n,6)<<endl;
    }
}
